description: Monitor for MOF files outside of the HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\WBEM folder, as almost all legitimate MOF files will be stored in the WBEM folder.(Citation: Evil WMI) Adversaries may create modified MOF files to be complied into WMI event subscriptions.

external_references.description: Chad Tilbury. (2023, May 22). Finding Evil WMI Event Consumers with Disk Forensics. Retrieved February 9, 2024.
